mythology.title: Norse Mythology
mythology.heroTitle: The Sagas of Asgard and the World Tree
mythology.description:
Explore the mythology of the Norsemen - from the creation of the cosmos from Ymir's body to the
                prophesied destruction and rebirth at Ragnarok. Discover the wisdom of Odin, the might of Thor,
                the magic of Freyja, and the mysteries of the Nine Realms connected by Yggdrasil, the World Tree.

sections.text: The Sagas of Asgard and the World Tree

deities.name: Heimdall
deities.title: Norse - Heimdall
deities.description: Guardian of Bifrost, Watcher of the Gods
symbols: the sea and its waves (connected to his nine mothers)

relationships.father: sometimes identified as odin or left unnamed; the nine mothers gave birth to him together at the edge of the world
relationships.consort: none mentioned in surviving sources; his role as eternal watchman precludes domestic life
